languages.text: "Ладно тебе, Дэгген, давай уж объясним человеку перед смертью. Видите ли, {mf|господин|госпожа} Фиделио, мой покойный батюшка — Денз, забери его демоны, Беллардо — оставил все свое состояние вам. Не мне, единственному сыну, не своему старшему помощнику, а вам. Вывод? Вы должны умереть".

"Come now, Daggen, let's give the {mf|man|lady} an explanation before {mf|his|her} death. You see, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, my late father — Denz, daemons take him, Bellardo — has bequeathed his entire fortune to you. Not to me, his only son, not to his first mate — you. So where does that leave us? You must die."
languages.original_text: "Ладно тебе, Дэгген, давай уж объясним человеку перед смертью. Видите ли, {mf|господин|госпожа} Фиделио, мой покойный батюшка — Денз, забери его демоны, Беллардо — оставил все свое состояние вам. Не мне, единственному сыну, не своему старшему помощнику, а вам. Вывод? Вы должны умереть".

traits.locale_text: "Come now, Daggen, let's give the {mf|man|lady} an explanation before {mf|his|her} death. You see, {mf|Master|Madam} Fidelio, my late papa — Denz, daemons take him, Bellardo — has bequeathed his entire fortune to you. Not me, his only son, not his first mate — you. So where does that leave us? You must die."

"Come now, Daggen, let's give the {mf|man|lady} an explanation before {mf|his|her} death. You see, {mf|Master|Madam} Fidelio, my late papa — Denz, daemons take him, Bellardo — has bequeathed his entire fortune to you. Not me, his only son, not his first mate — you. So where does that leave us? You must die."

"Come now, Daggen, let's give the {mf|man|lady} an explanation before {mf|his|her} death. You see, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, my late father — Denz, daemons take him, Bellardo — has bequeathed his entire fortune to you. Not to me, his only son, not to his first mate — you. So where does that leave us? You must die."

"Come now, Daggen, let's give the {mf|man|lady} an explanation before {mf|his|her} death. You see, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, my late father — Denz, daemons take him, Bellardo — has bequeathed his entire fortune to you. Not to me, his only son, not to his first mate — you. So where does that leave us? You must die."

"Come now, Daggen, let's give the {mf|man|lady} an explanation before {mf|his|her} death. You see, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, my late father — Denz, daemons take him, Bellardo — has bequeathed his entire fortune to you. Not to me, his only son, not to his first mate — you. So where does that leave us? You must die."

languages.text: “好了，达根。杀了这个人之前，咱们先给{mf|他|她}个解释吧。你看，菲迪奥{mf|大师|女士}，我已故的父亲，丹兹——呃，该死，是贝拉多。他把他所有的遗产全都赠给了你，没有给他唯一的儿子我，也没有给他的大副。在这种情况下，你说我们该怎么办？你非死不可。”
languages.original_text: "Come now, Daggen, let's give the {mf|man|lady} an explanation before {mf|his|her} death. You see, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, my late father — Denz, daemons take him, Bellardo — has bequeathed his entire fortune to you. Not to me, his only son, not to his first mate — you. So where does that leave us? You must die."

traits.locale_text: “好了，达根。杀了这个人之前，咱们先给{mf|他|她}个解释吧。你看，菲迪奥{mf|大师|女士}，我以故的父亲，丹兹——呃，该死，是贝拉多。他把他所有的遗产全都赠给了你，没有给他唯一的儿子我，也没有给他的大副。在这种情况下，你说我们该怎么办？你非死不可。”

languages.text: «Vamos, Daggen, démosle a {mf|este hombre|esta mujer} una explicación antes de matar{mf|lo|la}. Verá, {mf|señor|señora} Fidelio, mi difunto padre, Denz Bellardo, que los daemons se lo lleven, le ha legado toda su fortuna. No a mí, su único hijo, ni a su contramaestre. Entonces, ¿dónde nos deja eso? Debe morir».
languages.original_text: "Come now, Daggen, let's give the {mf|man|lady} an explanation before {mf|his|her} death. You see, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, my late father — Denz, daemons take him, Bellardo — has bequeathed his entire fortune to you. Not to me, his only son, not to his first mate — you. So where does that leave us? You must die."

traits.locale_text: «Vamos, Daggen, démosle a {mf|este hombre|esta mujer} una explicación antes de matar{mf|lo|la}. Verá, {mf|señor|señora} Fidelio, mi difunto padre, Denz Bellardo, que los daemons se lo lleven, le ha legado toda su fortuna. No a mí, su único hijo, ni a su contramaestre. Entonces, ¿dónde nos deja eso? Debe morir».

languages.text: 「まあまあダゲン、せめてもの情けで死ぬ理由くらいは教えてやろう。あのなあ、{mf|マスター|ミストレス}・フィデリオ…俺の亡き親父デンツ・ベラルドは唯一の息子の俺でもなく、信頼できる航海士でもなく…全財産をあんたに遺した。だから、あんたには死んでもらうしかないんだよ」
languages.original_text: "Come now, Daggen, let's give the {mf|man|lady} an explanation before {mf|his|her} death. You see, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, my late father — Denz, daemons take him, Bellardo — has bequeathed his entire fortune to you. Not to me, his only son, not to his first mate — you. So where does that leave us? You must die."

traits.locale_text: 「まあまあダゲン、せめてもの情けで死ぬ理由くらいは教えてやろう。あのなあ、{mf|マスター|ミストレス}・フィデリオ…俺の亡き親父デンツ・ベラルドは唯一の息子の俺でもなく、信頼できる航海士でもなく…全財産をあんたに遺した。だから、あんたには死んでもらうしかないんだよ」

languages.text: "Ach, Daggen, geben wir {mf|dem Herren|der Dame} doch eine Erklärung, bevor {mf|er|sie} stirbt. Wisst Ihr {mf|Herr|Herrin} Fidelio, mein verstorbener Vater – Denz die Dämonen sollen ihn holen Bellardo – hat Euch sein gesamtes Vermögen vermacht. Nicht mir, seinem einzigen Sohn, nicht seinem Ersten Offizier – Euch. Was bleibt uns also übrig? Ihr müsst sterben."
languages.original_text: "Come now, Daggen, let's give the {mf|man|lady} an explanation before {mf|his|her} death. You see, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, my late father — Denz, daemons take him, Bellardo — has bequeathed his entire fortune to you. Not to me, his only son, not to his first mate — you. So where does that leave us? You must die."

traits.locale_text: "Ach, Daggen, geben wir {mf|dem Herren|der Dame} doch eine Erklärung, bevor {mf|er|sie} stirbt. Wisst Ihr {mf|Herr|Herrin} Fidelio, mein verstorbener Vater – Denz die Dämonen sollen ihn holen Bellardo – hat Euch sein gesamtes Vermögen vermacht. Nicht mir, seinem einzigen Sohn, nicht seinem Ersten Offizier – Euch. Was bleibt uns also übrig? Ihr müsst sterben."

languages.text: « Allons, Daggen, {mf|ce pauvre homme|cette pauvre femme} mérite bien une explication avant de mourir. Vous voyez, {mf|maître|maîtresse} Fidélio, mon défunt père – Denz Bellardo, qu'il rôtisse en enfer – vous a légué toute sa fortune. Pas à moi, son fils unique, ni à son premier lieutenant, mais à vous. Vous comprenez donc qu'on n'a pas le choix. Vous devez mourir. »
languages.original_text: "Come now, Daggen, let's give the {mf|man|lady} an explanation before {mf|his|her} death. You see, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, my late father — Denz, daemons take him, Bellardo — has bequeathed his entire fortune to you. Not to me, his only son, not to his first mate — you. So where does that leave us? You must die."

traits.locale_text: « Allons, Daggen, {mf|ce pauvre homme|cette pauvre femme} mérite bien une explication avant de mourir. Vous voyez, {mf|maître|maîtresse} Fidélio, mon défunt père – Denz Bellardo, qu'il rôtisse en enfer – vous a légué toute sa fortune. Pas à moi, son fils unique, ni à son premier lieutenant, mais à vous. Vous comprenez donc qu'on n'a pas le choix. Vous devez mourir. »

languages.text: "Hadi ama Daggen. Son nefesini vermeden önce {mf|beyefendiye|hanımefendiye} bir açıklama yapalım. Bak Fidelio {mf|Bey|Hanım}, yüzünü iblisler göresice rahmetli babam Denz Bellardo tüm varlığını sana bıraktı. Tek evladı olan bana veya ikinci kaptanına değil de sana. Hâliyle ne olması gerekiyor? Tabii ki ölmen."
languages.original_text: "Come now, Daggen, let's give the {mf|man|lady} an explanation before {mf|his|her} death. You see, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, my late father — Denz, daemons take him, Bellardo — has bequeathed his entire fortune to you. Not to me, his only son, not to his first mate — you. So where does that leave us? You must die."

traits.locale_text: "Hadi ama Daggen. Son nefesini vermeden önce {mf|beyefendiye|hanımefendiye} bir açıklama yapalım. {mf|Beyefendi|Hanımefendi} Fidelio, rahmetli babam Denz iblisler görsün yüzünü Bellardo, tüm varlığını sana bıraktı. Tek evladı olan bana veya ikinci kaptanına değil, sana. Bu durum neyi doğuruyor diye düşünecek olursan... Ölmelisin."
